CustomField.description: Set the log level for which a record will be created in the Pharos Log object in response to a Log Event. Whenever a Log Event is created and the level of the event is encompassed by the currently set Pharos Log Level, a record will be created. Otherwise, no record will be created.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set the log level for which a record will be created in the Pharos Log object in response to a Log Event. Whenever a Log Event is created and the level of the event is encompassed by the currently set Pharos Log Level, a record will be created. Otherwise, no record will be created.
CustomField.label: Pharos Log Level
